name: ATO Smart Aviation
about: Smart Aviation is a modern international flight school based in Poznan, Poland, and is the only EASA Approved Training Organization in the region offering comprehensive flight training from zero to ATPL(A) frozen. With over 10 years of experience, our highly qualified team of instructors, many of whom have airline backgrounds, provide top-notch training using a new fleet of Tecnam aircraft. Located at Poznan-Lawica International Airport, our students benefit from training in a fully controlled environment, enhancing their radio communication skills. We offer a range of courses including PPL(A), IR(A), CPL(A), and ATPL(A) theoretical training, as well as MCC and type rating programs. Our graduates have successfully secured jobs with major airlines such as LOT, SkyTaxi, and Ryanair. Smart Aviation is committed to delivering training on time, within budget, and with a strong focus on individual student needs, ensuring a successful aviation career.
